Pre-Game Insights: The Faroe Islands are on a three-game losing streak and have won just one of their last 16 games across all competitions.
North Macedonia have also lost their last three games on the bounce and are winless in their last six.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The two sides faced off for the first-ever time in a friendly clash last March which the visitors won 1-0 via a late strike from Girona striker Bojan Miovski.
The hosts have managed just two clean sheets in their last 22 games across all competitions.
Others: The Faroe Islands were ranked 72nd in the latest FIFA rankings and now sit 66 places above their weekend opponents.
